Name: Amok Runner
About the game: Discover the tragic events of a doctor who faces an existential crisis in a small, remote seaside town. The story begins with a noblewoman who visits this doctor's clinic. A disease that spreads relentlessly, a frenzy... Everyone you see, meet, greet may suddenly become your enemy. And in the midst of all this danger, a quest, a desperate pursuit... You will experience the intense action through Amok's exciting fighting sequences. Don't hesitate to use your gun to stay alive! Drive around the streets of the Riverside town in a variety of vehicles in an open world setting. Experience the interactive, fascinating and equally gloomy atmosphere! Solve mysterious puzzles, use your mind to overcome the obstacles one by one! Unlock the secrets of this extraordinary and rich story by collecting and reading the notes scattered around! A LOVE STORY The disease is spreading more and more each day. While townsfolk are desperately leaving the town in the face of this insanity, the doctor is in pursuit of an obsessive love. A CRUEL DISEASE They run incredibly fast towards every living thing they see, with all of their energy. They attack all things that move; human or animal, it doesn't matter. The name of this disease and insanity is AMOK. ABOUT THE STORY Meet Stefan Zweig, one of the most famous authors of his time. Through Amok Runner, experience his fascinating and rich world which is full of surprises. DLSS and FIDELITY FX SUPPORT Amok Runner supports NVIDIA® DLSS and AMD FidelityFX™ technologies that enable gorgeous, high-quality sharp images without sacrificing frame rates. CONTROLS A wide variety of game controllers are supported, as well as fully customizable keyboard keys and adjustable mouse sensitivity. VISUALS With widescreen, HDR and 4K resolution support, you can get high-quality visuals and change all the settings individually.
